author: Anonymous Poet
title: Semi colon Shortcut
question: Is there a short cut wherein you can highlight a block of code (multiple lines) and transform them all into comments i.e. "semicolon'ize" them?
student_answer:
It should be under "Racket" on the taskbar and you can scroll down to "Comment out with semicolons"
ctrl + alt + ; on windows (idk what the equivalent is on mac sorry mac users)
you can find more keybinds in the Edit tab of drracket
